attributes.action: Stop Imperial War Museum closing medal collection
attributes.additional_details: To close this exhibition is an affront to British History; it dishonours the memory of very brave people who enabled us all to enjoy freedom, and robs the younger generations of the opportunity to learn about valour and service to not only their own country but to the wider world as well.
attributes.background: Stop Imperial War Museum closing medal collection

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Imperial War Museum, not the UK Government or Parliament.
